title: Rosa Klebb

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, force a player's visit to fail

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Investigative players are given framed results.
- You will be informed of who they visit.
Scheme:**Death Warrant:**
All Non-SPECTRE Investigative roles die immediately. And wills become disabled for the rest of the game. The graveyard is hidden, and all future deaths are cleaned.

desc:
Post 4408
*Who can the Russians suspect but the British? The Cold War in Istanbul will not remain cold very much longer.*
